channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why are 'fireworks' coming from a black hole? This is what scientists say
item.description: A team of astrophysicists have found flares of light in Sagittarius A*, a supermassive black hole in the center of the Milky Way.

item.title: Body returned from Gaza is not Shiri Bibas, Israeli military says
item.description: Israel has accused Hamas of violating the ceasefire - a claim to which Hamas has not yet responded.

item.title: Musk's private security detail deputized by U.S. Marshals Service, sources say
item.description: The U.S. Marshals Service routinely deputizes police. However, the move to deputize private security officers, who are not sworn law enforcement offic...

item.title: Why ice loss in the Arctic is threatening polar bear populations
item.description: After a summer of fasting on land, the bears need to get back to their frozen home to hunt seals and bulk up. But their migration ritual is changing.

item.title: How LA wildfires are making an already tough rental market even worse

item.title: Venezuelan mothers organize on chat group to fight Guantánamo detentions

item.title: Delta releases info about crew for flight that crashed, flipped in Toronto

item.title: How Trump’s mass layoffs raise the risk of wildfires in the US West, according to fired workers
Three buses explode in Israel in 'suspected terror attack', police say
item.description: While no casualties have been reported at this stage, all public transport services have been paused.

item.title: Canada beats US in revenge hockey rematch played on political thin ice
item.description: The two countries battled it out at the final game of the 4 Nations Face Off amid a tense political backdrop.

item.title: Illegal crossings at U.S.-Mexico border down 94%, Border Patrol chief says

item.title: Hong Kong's main opposition party announces plan to dissolve
item.description: Once Hong Kong's largest opposition party, the Democratic Party has suffered since China's crackdown.

item.title: Man disguised as lawyer kills gang leader in court
item.description: Police say the gunman used a revolver which was smuggled in a hollowed-out book by a female suspect.
